subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Marco Andretti is an Indy-car rookie, and his father Michael Andretti owns his car, but Michael plans to join him in the 90th Indianapolis 500.
snippet: Marco Andretti is an Indy-car rookie, and his father Michael Andretti owns his car, but Michael plans to join him in the 90th Indianapolis 500.
